item.description: Sunday June 10, 2007, 11:00 am - Gloucester Walking by the Sea - 5-7 mile walk in the historic harbors of Gloucester. Remember "The Perfect Storm". It all started here. We will begin at Stage Fort Park in the heart of downtown Gloucester (large parking lot and visitors lot there) then move on to East Gloucester, Atlantic Road, great ocean vistas, crashing surf on the rocks - ong sidewalk route eventually ending at Good Harbor Beach. Note: carpooling is recommended/available. Carpoolers meet at LL Bean lot in Burlington MA off of Rte 128/95 exit 33a. Gloucester is 30 minutes from Burlington on the North Shore. Carpoolers should be at 10:25 am in the LL Bean parking lot. The walk starts at 11:00 am. Please note there is a $1.00 Fee payable to the organizer. Thanks. See you all there.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: GLOUCESTER BY THE SEA - SUNDAY JUNE 10, 2007
